description: Software development for INDITEX client. Implementation and design of web applications, integrated into a microfrontend system, applying for the front part: React, Typescript, state management with contexts, Zustand. Use of React hooks and custom hooks. Styled with React Styled components, PostCSS, TailwindCSS. Layout with HTML5, Framer Motion. Development applying Test-Driven-Development (TDD) using React Testing Library and Jest. Development for Backend for Frontends (BFFs) using NodeJS, TypeScript and KOA. Definition and management of APIs. Supervision and learning of new colleagues. Daily work with methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban

Frontend development with React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, React Hooks, Contexts

Development and maintenance of Java applications based on the SpringBoot and Spring MVC frameworks. Creation, consumption and maintenance of REST APIs. Creation, maintenance and automation of processes with Spring Batch.

Software development and maintenance in applications related to public administration using Java technology with SQL databases.

Use of React, SASS, HTML5, CSS3, Webpack, React Hooks, REDUX to create user interfaces.

Development of ETL processes using Python and Docker.
